channel.title: [317/PI] Need to know a Delay method [317/PI]

item.title: [317/PI] Need to know a Delay method [317/PI]
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

Alright, I was writing a command for dicing, and its not executing quite how I want it to, I’m a basic java coder, I know only the basics and I’m stuck, i’ve tried using food delays and everything, nothing works!

The issue is, half the time it doesn’t say Rolling… and perform the emote. it’ll go straight into, yes I won, or love my life I lost.
I want it to say Rolling… while performing the 827 emote and then waiting til its finished before saying. YES! I wont or No! does anyone understand my question?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int Itempot = newItemAmount + newItemAmount; c.forcedChat("Rolling..."); c.startAnimation(827); if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, newItemAmount)) { int random = Misc.random(100); if (random >= 55) { c.startAnimation(862); c.forcedChat("Yes! I rolled a " + random + " and won " + Itempot + " coins!"); c.getItems().addItem(995, newItemAmount); } else if (random <= 54) { c.startAnimation(859); c.forcedChat("love my life! I rolled a " + random + " and lost " + newItemAmount + "!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), newItemAmount); } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have that many coins to bet!"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: [317/PI] Need to know a Delay method [317/PI]
